name: 2nd International Forum on Traditional and Alternative Medicine-
content: It is with great pleasure that CONTINUUM FORUMS welcome all the researchers in the field of Traditional and Alternative Medicine to the 2nd International Forum on Traditional and Alternative Medicine (TAMFORUM2024), which will be held in Budapest, Hungary from November 18-20, 2024\. The aim of TAMFORUM2024 is to be a premier international forum to highlight novel developments, share new ideas, research results, and development experiences, and provide networking opportunities with peers to help establish connections for early career scientists to meet a diverse mix of researchers, decision-makers to strengthen existing connections and forge new ones.
